verbs.description: Just days after [ARG0: Trump] [V: boasted] , " [ARG1: When I make promises , I keep them] , " he audaciously broke one of his most populist promises .
Just days after Trump boasted , " [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: I] [V: make] [ARG1: promises] , I keep them , " he audaciously broke one of his most populist promises .
Just days after Trump boasted , " [ARGM-TMP: When I make promises] , [ARG0: I] [V: keep] [ARG1: them] , " he audaciously broke one of his most populist promises .
[ARGM-TMP: Just days after Trump boasted , " When I make promises , I keep them] , " [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MNR: audaciously] [V: broke] [ARG1: one of his most populist promises] .
